replies.body: can we enter more than once?
You can enter more than once, but we suggest focusing on quality not quantity here =D
Thanks, I just have 2 cosplays ready to go and couldnt choose one thats all.

Hey, I have a question

I'm not really sure what specifically you are asking for in terms of cosplay, whether it can be a full cosplay (I cosplay Jinx, with all 3 guns: http://imgur.com/dL37I4Y) or if its meant to be yourself taking aspects from a champion.

Also really curious as to what to do with the insignia. Are we making it and putting it on us or printing it on paper?

If there were some examples that would be handy :^)

Thanks!

"Your entry must be made by you, submitted by you, and made for this contest: this is about YOU showing YOUR artistic talents specifically for this contest"

Your page says the guns were commissioned, so if you're using jinx make sure it's only the parts you made! :)

Hey you are meant to become a homeguard. So it's meant to be you taking on aspects from a champion.

The insignia should be on you in some way. Check out the header image on the Ocean Week sight for examples of Homeguards =D

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oceanweek-2017
Ah, I see. So a full cosplay wouldn't count then, I assume?
So essentially, it's more focused on each of us as players as the focus of this event rather than the champions that we play. We take on aspects of those champions, but WE are the homeguards!
Would casual clothing with the insignia + the wig and one of the guns count?
That would work =D
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Can we collaborate with someone else and/or create+wear a costume designed by someone else WITH their acknowledgement and consent?
needs to be made by you - Your entry must be made by you, submitted by you, and made for this contest: this is about YOU showing YOUR artistic talents specifically for this contest
{{champion:202}} If someone does a jhin cosplay i will be so happy
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
The YouTube equivalent of being first on a league of legends page is not saying saying "First". But instead it is saying "Urf?"
